about_the_game:
Relax & recover in this short free 3D environment where you take control of your favorite bath tub girl. My Bath Tub Companion is an experience, to induce a calm & peaceful (and mildly horny) feeling. You'll feel satisfied sitting back, feel yourself relax as you watch her relax.

Watch her from a distance, become her rubber duck toy, or see through her eyes. Take control and watch her enjoy herself with props around the room.

Gain answers to some of life's biggest questions, like: What is my girlfriend doing when she is in the bath tub for so long? How did we use up so much hot water on the utility bill? Why is there a charge for 50 rubber ducks on my credit card?



People have places to be, stress to worry about, but not you.
Sit back, relax, listen to the sounds, enjoy the soothing visuals. Relaxation is the key to a blissful bath tub experience, and we've got you covered. Calm music & a beautiful girl to look at.

Features List

  • Create ducks in the bath tub
  • Possess the rubber duck & see what she does with it
  • Possess her to see through her eyes
  • Relaxing music

About

This is a fun project we decided to work on together to develop our skills. If you like what you see, consider joining our Discord to see our latest art & full game releases as they come.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexually explicit acts & nudity. All characters are 18+

name: My Bath Tub Companion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: My Bath Tub Companion is a free experience, to induce a calm & peaceful (and mildly horny) feeling. You'll feel satisfied sitting back, feel yourself relax as you watch her relax. Relaxation is the key to a blissful bath tub experience. Calm music & a beautiful girl to look at.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
